useCase.name: View Assigned Campers Schedule
useCase.description: As a Camp Worker, I want to view the schedule and location of the campers assigned to me.

preconditions.precondition: The Camp Worker is logged into the Camp Management System.

successEndConditions.condition: The Camp Worker successfully views the schedule and location information for assigned campers.

useCase.trigger: User selects the option to view assigned camper schedule.

mainSequence.step: Camp Worker logs into the system.
System fetches the list of campers assigned to the Camp Worker from the Camper Profiles database.
System retrieves the schedule and location information for each camper from the Scheduling Service database.
System displays the list of campers with their respective schedule and location to the Camp Worker.
